Text.Language: Twbh m~P[oic e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ pa[oic n~iwt n~ackut/c: abba Parcwma pirefb/s: nt~ef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O my master the ascetic father, Abba Parsouma the Naked, that He may forgive us our sins.
